name: Line WIthouth a HOOK [1 Day]
description:
This game was made by me in 1 day, the Jam takes 72h but i personal things to resolve so i decided to make an simple game in 1 day :D

In this game you try to catch 50 fish with your rope, but be careful there is some things that you cant catch, like bombs and puffer fishes

How to play:

Try to catch all the fish, if you let the fish go up, you take damage, if you touch a bomb or a puffer fish you take damage too, when you lose health you win some points, if you fill the border next to the health, you can heal yourself

Controls:

MoveA/DPauseEsc

Credits:

  • Music:  Music Link
  • Art: EDRO
  • Code: EDRO
